title: Fy Fy Fy Kalaachify Lyrics Pandiya Nadu Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Fy FY FY kalaachify
Singer:Ramya Nambeesan
Movie: Pandiya nadu
Muisc: D Imman
Lyrics: Vairamuthu

Fy FY FY kalaachify
karuppaa nee vaa enna kalaachify
fy fy fy sodhapify
poruppa ne irukaadha sodhapify

Vetkatha venaannu otify
nenjoda neengaama ottify
muttaadhe muthatha vaayodu
vaai vachi
Fy FY FY kalaachify
karuppaa nee vaa enna kalaachify
fy fy fy sodhapify
poruppa ne irukaadha sodhapify
Vetkatha venaannu otify
nenjoda neengaama ottify
muttaadhe muthatha vaayodu
vaai vachi

Sollikodu maama en chella chella maama
nee solla solla kadhal varum ne thallify
aayasyilla aanaa nee, sim-u illa phone-ah
singal inga fullu naalum yen thinki fy

touch touchu screenaatam
munna vandhu ninna ne
vandhu nondi fy
Pacha pachayaaga en ichayaaga sonna
achamellaam nee pokki fy fy fy
fy fy fy fy

Fy FY FY kalaachify
karuppaa nee vaa enna kalaachify
fy fy fy sodhapify

Panjaayathu kootify
ettu patti ketufy
niyamam edhu dharmam edhu
nee paarthu fy

Naatuthena sllify
kuthamenna thalli fy
naataamayum theerpa konja nee maathify

Thiki thikki pechaala thoki thooki pota
enna enna nee thooki fy
nelli vettu kannaala, alli mottu mela
thatti thatti nee thaakify fy fy fy fy fy

Fy FY FY kalaachify
karuppaa nee vaa enna kalaachify
fy fy fy sodhapify
poruppa ne irukaadha sodhapify

Vetkatha venaannu otify
nenjoda neengaama ottify
muttaadhe muthatha vaayodu
vaai vachi
